Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 32 year old female lyricist with C/O mild nausea, mild diarrhea, mild abdominal pain and Stomach. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life drinks daily o:Height 157 cm, Weight 49.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed hyoscyamine - 0.125 mg 3-4 x day, and ordered CBC.

s:pt presents with mild diarrhea, mild abdominal pain and mild nausea for past 7 days. patient is a white female aged 33 ys. she consumes 2 drinks per night she denies smoking o:Height 157 cm, Weight 50.1 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed sertraline - 100 mg daily, and ordered CBC.
